26
27#include "lafe_platform.h"
28__FBSDID("$FreeBSD$");
29
30#ifdef HAVE_STDARG_H
31#include <stdarg.h>
32#endif
33#include <stdio.h>
34#ifdef HAVE_STDLIB_H
35#include <stdlib.h>
36#endif
37#ifdef HAVE_STRING_H
38#include <string.h>
39#endif
40
41#include "err.h"
42
43static void lafe_vwarnc(int, const char *, va_list) __LA_PRINTFLIKE(2, 0);
44
45static const char *lafe_progname;
46
47const char *
48lafe_getprogname(void)
49{
50
51 return lafe_progname;
52}
53
54void
55lafe_setprogname(const char *name, const char *defaultname)
56{
57
58 if (name == NULL)
59 name = defaultname;
60#if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
61 lafe_progname = strrchr(name, '\\');
62 if (strrchr(name, '/') > lafe_progname)
63#endif
64 lafe_progname = strrchr(name, '/');
65 if (lafe_progname != NULL)
66 lafe_progname++;
67 else
68 lafe_progname = name;
69}
70
71static void
72lafe_vwarnc(int code, const char *fmt, va_list ap)
73{
74 fprintf(stderr, "%s: ", lafe_progname);
75 vfprintf(stderr, fmt, ap);
76 if (code != 0)
77 fprintf(stderr, ": %s", strerror(code));
78 fprintf(stderr, "\n");
79}
80
81void
82lafe_warnc(int code, const char *fmt, ...)
83{
84 va_list ap;
85
86 va_start(ap, fmt);
87 lafe_vwarnc(code, fmt, ap);
88 va_end(ap);
89}
90
91void
92lafe_errc(int eval, int code, const char *fmt, ...)
93{
94 va_list ap;
95
96 va_start(ap, fmt);
97 lafe_vwarnc(code, fmt, ap);
98 va_end(ap);
99 exit(eval);
100}
101
